short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to press enter after a colon without adding an emoji on Github

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you type enter just after typing a colon on Github, it adds the first emoji (in english, there is no space before a colon unlike in french for example).

So this extension allows you to type "enter" just after a colon without adding an emoji (to do that you need to type a least one character of it).
